appearances.title: Secys. Kennedy and Rollins Announce New Nutrition Policy : CSPAN3 : January 12, 2026 8:50am-9:55am EST
appearances.snippet: chairman of the house committee on agriculture glenn thompson, senate all caps chair, senator marshallreat friend and advocate. caucus chairs, and buchanan chairman of the committee representative kevin hearn, chairman of the republican study committee representative, chairman of the house appropriations subcommittee on agriculture and representative nick and that many executives of food companies and major associations here with us today. today marks a revolutionary change in a nutrition policy made possible by president trumps leadership in the work of the mom's and public health advocates that demanded reform. today we are here to celebrate the release of the american guidelines. the most significant reset in history. mistakes are measurable and severe. the highest obesity and type two diabetes rate in the developed world. three times more per capita than the european union on healthcare. in our life expectancy is five years shorter. largely due to diet -related chronic disease. our childhood obesity rates are five times higher than obesity rates among children in france. one third
